item.title: Smallfoot
item.description: "Smallfoot" overturns the myth of bigfutah upside down. In it a young resourceful Yeti is faced with the fact that his deep conviction that there is no man. News on "smolfute" brought him fame and a chance to win the girl of his dreams. And yet-cause a stir among ordinary Yeti who now wonder what else lives in the big world outside their small snowbound villages.

item.title: Suicide Squad: Hell to Pay
item.description: Amanda Waller brings together the Task Force of Ickx consisting of Dedshot, Harley Quinn, the Captain Bumeranga, the Murderer of Moroz, the Brazen Serpent and the Bronze Tiger again. Their task — to find Steel Maksum and to receive for Amanda the mystical black playing card with the inscription "Free Exit from Hell".

item.title: Sherlock Gnomes
item.description: Gnomeo and Juliette are waited by a new fascinating adventure — now in huge London. When heroes with families and friends move to the city, their main care — to prepare the new garden by spring. But soon they learn disturbing news: across all London their fellows gnomes enigmatically disappear! And once Gnomeo and Juliette, having come back home, find, as all their relatives disappeared. In such situation can only come to the rescue … Sherlock Gnoms. The famous detective becomes on protection of inhabitants of the London gardens and not without the aid of the faithful companion Watson undertakes to solve tangled case.
item.category: Movies Adventure Animation Comedy Family Fantasy Mystery Romance
item.dc:creator: Admin

item.title: Isle of Dogs
item.description: History of the 12-year-old boy Atari Kobayashi sponsored by the corrupted mayor Kobayashi. When under the Decree of the last all domestic dogs of the city of Megasaki are expelled on an enormous dump, Atari alone goes on the tiny aircraft to the garbage island to find the faithful dog known as Spots. There on the island together with pack of new friends mongrels it will begin an epic travel which will decide future destiny of all Prefecture.
item.category: Movies Adventure Animation Comedy Drama Fantasy Sci-Fi
item.dc:creator: Admin

item.title: Lego DC Comics Super Heroes: The Flash
item.description:
Atom visits the Hall of justice where it meets Batman, the Superman, their pets a German shepherd the Ace and a superdog Crypto and also with the Cyborg. The Wonderful female, Plastikmen and the Fiery Storm join them and they invite Atom to enter League of Justice.

Suddenly the alarm signal arrives and Lois Lane reports that the Joker attacked the Metropolis. It strikes citizens with ridiculous gas and goes to the building of Daily Planet to change it. The batman sends an alarm signal to the Flash and the League of justice goes to the Metropolis.

item.title: The Death of Superman
item.description: Clark Kent thinks of opening loved by Lois Lane the biggest secret — that he is a Superman. To the same time for Earth there arrives the terrible monster of Dumsdey having the improbable force and rage. All superheroes as a part of League of justice hardly constrain the monster therefore the Superman should postpone the personal records and to try to help companions to defeat the enemy.

item.title: Batman Ninja
item.description: Having got to an action field of the time machine invented by the Gorilla Grodd, Batman is had to medieval Japan. There it turns out that already not bad ояпонившиеся villains of Gotham head certain principalities, and the Joker who reached a certain influence at last waited for arrival of the main enemy. But not all want Bruce Wayne's death — the Catwoman and faithful servant Alfred looked forward to Batman's appearance too.

item.title: Frozen
item.description: On a birthday of Anna, Elza and Christoff are full of determination to present it the best holiday made ever, but ice forces of Elza can do more harm, than the organization of a holiday.

item.title: Stick Man
item.description: Somehow Mr. Rostock went to jog to the park. So it turned out that he got into a small scrape and cannot come back home in any way. Sprout got lost in the dense forest, and the house the wife with children, and already on a nose waits for Christmas …
